Class ProcessVariableParameter

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.evolver.Parameter

All Implemented Interfaces:
ParameterInstanceFactory, SimulationEvaluatorTargetFactory
public class ProcessVariableParameter
extends DoubleParameter
implements SimulationEvaluatorTargetFactory

A parameter subclass usable for parameters backed by process variables.

Constructor Summary
ProcessVariableParameter(Shape region, String processVariable, String faction)
          Creates a new ProcessVariableParameter defined on the scecified region concerning the specified process variable for the specified faction.

Constructor Detail

ProcessVariableParameter

public ProcessVariableParameter(Shape region,
                                String processVariable,
                                String faction)
Creates a new ProcessVariableParameter defined on the scecified region concerning the specified process variable for the specified faction.

Parameters:
region - the region to sample.
processVariable - the variable to sample (may be null)
faction - the faction to sample (may be null)
